title.narrative: 2.6. CHILD PROTECTION IN EMERGENCIES

description.narrative: Output 2.6: By the end of 2021, child protection is fully integrated in the country's emergency preparedness and response capacity., which contributes to Child Protection And Emergencies, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, United Nations Working Together. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Outcome 2: By the end of 2021, disadvantaged children and adolescents have improved access to quality education and benefit from social services and judicial proceedings which promote their best interests

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 2.6: By the end of 2021, child protection is fully integrated in the country’s emergency preparedness and response capacity.

description.narrative: Capacities of Iranian Red Crescent Society volunteers and SAHAR (Psychosocial Support) teams were enhanced for provision of Child Protection in Emergencies (CPiE) interventions. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:23/08/2020

title.narrative: Number of governmental and non-governmental organizations able to provide child protection services in emergency situations as per the Minimum Standards for Child Protection in Humanitarian Action.
Number of governmental and non-governmental organizations able to provide child protection services in emergency situations as per the Minimum Standards for Child Protection in Humanitarian Action.
Number of children, parents and primary caregivers provided with community based mental health and psychosocial support and messaging [COVIDSitRep]
Availability of a national Child Protection contingency plan.

actual.value: 2020:Establishment of the working group called for internal coordination mechanism in place within IRCS to bring all stakeholders around the table. Despite Iran CO advocacy and continuous follow-ups the priority of the partners was shifted to flood response

title.narrative: Availability of a national Child Protection contingency plan.

actual.value: 2020:Establishment of the working group called for internal coordination mechanism in place within IRCS to bring all stakeholders around the table. Despite Iran CO advocacy and continuous follow-ups the priority of the partners was shifted to flood response

title.narrative: Availability of a national Child Protection contingency plan.

actual.value: 2020:Pre-requisite of the capacity building was formation of the WG which did not happen.
